{{Wired embedded system |brand=Intrinsyc |model=CerfBoard |revision=255 |manuf_country=Canada |is_manuf=Yes |est_release_date=03/2003 |type=wired embedded board, development board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=3.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=1.3 |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=PXA255 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=28F128J3C150 |fla1_num=2 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S561632E-TC75 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 1.1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN91C111;LAN91C111-NE; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=32 Macrocell CPLD;Xilink;XCR3032XL;;1;,,, CMOS Real Time Clock;Philips;PCF8563;;1;,,, 64Kb Serial 3V FRAM Memory;Farnell;FM24CL64;;1;,,, 64Kb I2C Compatible 2-Wire Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC64;;1;,,, 16-bit Bus Transceiver w/ 3-State Outputs;TI;SN74LVCH16245A;;4;,,, Dual Output Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;TI;TPS70402;;1;,,, DMOS 500mA Low-Dropout Regulator;Burr Brown;REG103;;1;,,, 3.3V-5V 400Kbps RS232 3-Driver/5-Receiver Transceiver; STMicro;ST3243EC;;1; |flags=CompactFlash, UART, RTC w/ battery backup, |stock_boot=Cerf Generic Bootloader;V0.11; |stock_os=Windows;Embedded CE;4.2 Pro; |tp_firmware=Linux |oui_eth=00:D0:CA }} {{TagLine|Intrinsyc CerfBoard 255}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Intel XScale]]'' PXA255 :ARMv5TE @400MHz *RAM: 64MB (DR SDRAM) *Storage: 32MB (NOR) flash *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 1.1 port *Power: 5V/2.4A barrel plug *Dimensions (L x W): 2.75 x 2.5"
===See also=== *[[Intrinsyc CerfBoard 255]] • [[Intel XScale]] PXA255 (@400MHz) *[[Intrinsyc CerfCube]] • [[Intel StrongARM]] GDS1110BC (@192MHz) *[[Intrinsyc CerfCube 405EP]] • [[AMCC]]/[[IBM]] PowerPC 405EP ([https://www.ixbt.com/news/hard/index.shtml?00/72/07 802.11b, BT]) *[[Intrinsyc CerfPod]] • [[Intel StrongARM]] GDS1110BC (@192MHz) <!-- 32MB RAM, 16MB Flash -->([https://people.apache.org/~jim/NewArchitect/webtech/2001/10/infrrevu/index.html Spec.])
